PageTitle.Function: Displays the title of the current page

Content.Label: Quick Actions
Content.Function: Provides access to various quick actions

Content.Label: Ownership
Content.Function: Expands to show ownership related options

Content.Label: Equity Awards
Content.Function: Expands to show equity award options

Content.Label: Stakeholders
Content.Function: Expands to show stakeholder management options

NavigationSidebar.Function: Allows the user to navigate to different sections of the application

EquityPoolList.Function: Displays a list of all equity pools with related details

Title.Function: Indicates the action the user is about to perform

FormFields.Label: Pool Name
FormFields.Function: Allows user to enter the name of the new pool

FormFields.Label: Board Approval Date
FormFields.Function: Allows user to select the board approval date for the new pool

FormFields.Label: Shareholder Approval Date
FormFields.Function: Allows user to select the shareholder approval date for the new pool

FormFields.Label: Pool Size
FormFields.Function: Allows user to enter the size of the new pool

FormFields.Label: Underlying Share Class
FormFields.Function: Allows user to select the share class associated with the new pool

FormFields.Label: Include Pool in Captable?
FormFields.Function: Allows user to specify if the new pool should be included in the captable

FormFields.Label: Comments
FormFields.Function: Allows user to enter additional comments about the new pool

FormFields.Label: Supporting Documents
FormFields.Function: Allows users to attach documents to the new pool

Actions.Label: Cancel
Actions.Function: Closes the modal without saving any changes

Actions.Label: Add Pool
Actions.Function: Saves the new pool and closes the modal

AddPoolModal.Function: Allows users to input details for adding a new equity pool

BrandIdentity.Function: Displays the issuer's or company's branding
